name: Zoo Escape - A Paper Adventure
description:
Submission for the Wowie 2.0 Game Jam hosted by Jonas Tyroller.

This game was designed by my 12 year old little brother and is his first attempt at game design. I did all the technical work, and gave him tips to make a fun game.

Zoo Escape-

You are a human after animals rose up against humanity. Humans were forced into zoos. You happen to have obtained a dart gun with some tranquillizers as you try to stealth your way to destroy the eggs that keep the doors shut. Fight your way through three levels in this simple rouge-lite stealth game! 

Keep up with the dev and join the Steampunk Abyss Discord!
